title: Categories for the Curious
text:
Preface
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

title: 1  Introduction
text: This site contains the course notes for an informal one-semester seminar on category theory at CSU East Bay.

title: 2  Partially Ordered Sets
text:
2.1 The “Divides” Relation
Let \(m\) and \(n\) be integers. Recall that we say \(m\) /divides/ \(n\), and we write \(m \mid n\) if there exists an integer \(q\) such that \(mq = n\).

title: 2  Partially Ordered Sets
text:
2.2 Defining Posets
Let \(\preccurlyeq\) denote a partial order relation.
